channel.title: Could someone help
channel.description: I was wondering if someone could help me, or make a tut on how to make magic spells fail sometimes...like in real rs sometimes they fail (eg. splash) based on your mage level..It doesn't really have to be based on mage level because of course everyone has 99 mage lol...so I was just wondering if someone could help me make it possible for ancient spells to fail..

item.title: Could someone help
item.dc:creator: @fungame4u fungame4u
item.description:
@fungame4u wrote:

339 = big splash - magic spell failure[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 12:51:03 AM[/size][hr]So, can we get back on topic and help me figure out how to make like 1/10 spells fail (not do damage, not freeze, just show big splash. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 12:52:11 AM[/size][hr]I take it nobody can help? :([br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 01:03:06 AM[/size][hr]…???

Read full topic

item.title: Could someone help
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

What is the graphic ID for spells failing …? Because on my server, they never do anything except fail …

I have the full graphics with the mage gfx. It is cool. When you use fire wave, a fire wave comes out, hits them, and then does damage.

Read full topic
